main event: Two bright grey blue flat circular objects the size of ping pong balls were observed moving extremely fast before disappearing out of sight.
interesting points: The objects were seen for a duration of 10-15 seconds,The sighting occurred on 10 December 1956,Descriptions suggest the objects could have been a falling star or a comet,The report indicates that the sighting could have been caused by a meteor,There was a disagreement in conclusions about what the sighting might have been.
sighted object: two bright grey blue flat circular objects
